TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MultipartEncrypted extends MimeKit.Multipart

Docs.summary: A multipart MIME part with a ContentType of multipart/encrypted containing an encrypted MIME part.
Docs.remarks: This mime-type is common when dealing with PGP/MIME but is not used for S/MIME.
